About Me

BIO

I am a Full-Stack Developer in MERN technologies. I have also worked on react-native for android app development. I have used Graphql and Redux for state management in react. I also know concepts like Context API, react-hooks, CICD, AWS EC2 deployment, JWT token security, CSS in JS, git.

BluePi Consultant PVT LTD

Full Stack Developer

I worked as Full-Stack Developer. I have used Angular in front-end and Spring Boot in Backend. I worked on online training project where a user can register and opt for a course, after user enrolls a course he will be given set of videos for the course. The project also had traniers who were assigned to the trainees.
